Function reference

General Functions

These functions enable you to extract LCZ maps and calculate related parameters for spatial and environmental analysis.

lcz_get_map()
Download the LCZ map
lcz_get_map_euro()
Download LCZ map from the European
lcz_get_map_usa()
Download your LCZ map from the Continental United States
lcz_get_map_generator()
Download the LCZ map from LCZ Generator
lcz_get_map2()
Obtain the LCZ map from LCZ generator or with downloaded global LCZ map
lcz_plot_map()
Visualize the LCZ Map
lcz_cal_area()
Calculate LCZ areas
lcz_get_parameters()
Retrieve urban canopy LCZ parameters
lcz_plot_parameters()
Visualize LCZ parameters

Local Functions

These functions support air temperature modeling, anomaly detection, and Urban Heat Island (UHI) intensity calculations.

lcz_ts()
Analyze LCZ Time Series
lcz_anomaly()
Explore LCZ Thermal Anomalies
lcz_interp_map()
Interpolate spatial and temporal data using a Local Climate Zones (LCZ)
lcz_anomaly_map()
Interpolate spatial and temporal thermal anomaly using a Local Climate Zones (LCZ).
lcz_plot_interp()
Visualize Interpolated LCZ map
lcz_interp_eval()
Evaluate the LCZ-Based Interpolated Map
lcz_uhi_intensity()
Assess the Urban Heat Island Intensity

LCZ Tutorials and Data Access

Access detailed tutorials and example data to enhance your understanding and application of the LCZ4r package.

lcz_tutorial()
LCZ4r Tutorials
lcz_data
Air Temperature LCZ Data
